Defs:
SRV_FillProcessor UniversalFermenter.JobDriver_FillUF filling TargetA.
SRV_TakeItemOutOfProcessor UniversalFermenter.JobDriver_TakeProductOutOfUF removing processed items from TargetA. ]
SRV_TendToSmoker SurvivalistsAdditions.JobDriver_TendToSmoker tending to TargetA.
SRV_DisableSnare SurvivalistsAdditions.JobDriver_DisableSnare disabling TargetA.
